00056 #ifndef SC_VALUE_BASE_H
00057 #define SC_VALUE_BASE_H
00058 
00059 
00060 #include "sysc/datatypes/int/sc_nbdefs.h"
00061 
00062 namespace sc_dt
00063 {
00064 
00065 class sc_signed;
00066 class sc_unsigned;
00067 
00068 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 //  CLASS : sc_value_base
00070 //
00071 //  Abstract base class of all SystemC native variables. It provides
00072 //  support for concatenation operations via a set of virtual methods. 
00073 //  A general description of the methods appear with their default 
00074 //  definitions in sc_object.cpp.
00075 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 
00077 class SC_API sc_value_base 
00078 {
00079     friend class sc_concatref;
00080   private: 
00081     virtual void concat_clear_data( bool to_ones=false );
00082     virtual bool concat_get_ctrl( sc_digit* dst_p, int low_i ) const;
00083     virtual bool concat_get_data( sc_digit* dst_p, int low_i ) const;
00084     virtual uint64 concat_get_uint64() const;
00085     virtual int concat_length(bool* xz_present_p=0) const;
00086     virtual void concat_set( int64 src, int low_i );
00087     virtual void concat_set( const sc_signed& src, int low_i );
00088     virtual void concat_set( const sc_unsigned& src, int low_i );
00089     virtual void concat_set( uint64 src, int low_i );
00090   public:
00091     virtual ~sc_value_base() {}
00092 };
00093 
00094 
00095 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 //  CLASS : sc_generic_base
00097 //
00098 //  Proxy class for user-defined value classes and other classes that 
00099 //  are defined outside of SystemC. 
00100 //  The class is utilized as a base class for the arbitrary class:
00101 //
00102 //       class my_class : public sc_generic_base<my_class>
00103 //
00104 //  The purpose of the class is to allow to_XXXX methods defined within that 
00105 //  class so that assignments and casts from the arbitrary class to native 
00106 //  SystemC types are possible. To interact correctly with the SystemC library 
00107 //  the class derived from sc_generic_base must implement the following 
00108 //  methods: 
00109 //    (1) uint64 to_uint64() const
00110 //    (2) int64  to_int64() const
00111 //    (3) void to_sc_unsigned( sc_unsigned& ) const
00112 //    (4) void to_sc_signed( sc_signed& ) const
00113 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 template< class T >
00115 class sc_generic_base {
00116   public: 
00117     inline const T* operator-> () const
00118     {
00119         return (const T*)this;
00120     }
00121     inline T* operator-> () 
00122     {
00123         return (T*)this;
00124     }
00125 };
00126 
00127 } // namespace sc_dt
00128 
00129 #endif
